title: Vicky Pattison posts cute unfiltered pic sleeping on boyfriend's chest
text:
Vicky Pattison shared this cute photo of her with Ercan Ramadan (Picture: Getty Images/Instagram/@vickypattison)

Vicky Pattison wants to show the world she doesn’t care about posting ‘glamorous’ or ‘filtered’ photos with her boyfriend Ercan Ramadan and honestly, couple goals.

The 31-year-old former Geordie Shore star took to Instagram to share the adorable photo with a very special meaning in the caption.

‘He’s been threatening to post this for ages so I thought I’d get in there before him,’ she wrote about boyfriend Ercan. ‘But seriously I wouldn’t mind if he did because I love this picture… (I’m pleased it’s not a video as he swears I was drooling and snoring too mind).

She added: ‘But in a world where people only post the most glamorous pictures, the most posed photos and the most filtered images in a bid to show the world how happy and I’m (sic) love they are… I feel like for me, actually this is real happiness, perfect imperfection.’

Vicky explained she’s always had a rocky road when it comes to her sleeping patterns, but her boyfriend is a huge help.

She revealed: ‘Sleep has always been a problem for me (you know I whinge about it all the bloody time) but I’m his arms, not only am I relaxed, I’m so inhibited that I’m flat out snoring like a wilder-beast having the deepest snooze of me life.

‘So here I am- in my happy place, in [Ercan Ramadan]‘s ‘nook’, snug as a bug in a rug and truly feeling content.

‘I love you Mr, and I’m gutted to be leaving you again after just one night together but I can’t wait for the next couple months and all the lovely things we have planned together.

‘You’re the best, even if you take pictures of my double chin when I’m asleep- you toerag,’ she wrote.

Ercan lovingly responded to his girlfriend’s post: ‘Love you babe! I’ve got some more pics hehe birthday post pending.’

Vicky began dating Ercan earlier this year, revealing in August that they had moved in together.

They first got together after she liked one of his pictures on social media and they began talking, leading to their first date.

She was previously in a relationship with John Noble, her ex-fiance, but the pair split after he was caught cuddling up to another women on a night out in Dubai.
